DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the single dose pharmacokinetics (PK) and safety of TR701 FA in subjects with advance renal impairment.
DOC.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetics and Safety Study in Subjects With Renal Impairment
DOC.detailed_description: To assess the pharmacokinetics (PK) and evaluate the safety of intravenous (IV) infusion of TR-701 free acid (FA) in subjects with advanced renal impairment compared with matched control subjects with normal renal function
DOC.criteria: BMI between 18.0 and 40.0 kg/m2 inclusive Male or female subjects between 18 and 75 years of age Stable dosage of medication for 30 days for dialysis patients, receiving chronic and stable maintenance hemodialysis for at least 3 months Functioning transplanted solid organ High tyramine diet Significant, unstable, or lifethreatening condition or organ or system condition or disease, other than kidney disease in renal subjects
